Can you provide a small testcase?

I tried it on our codebase here and it takes about 5 hours for indexing to 
finish. I have switched off indexing and can't afford another 5 hours. These 
exceptions seemed to be happening on around 50 % of the types and methods that 
I was clicking on. I am sorry that I cannot provide a small testcase but I 
belive that if you have a few projects with a fair ammount of source files this 
bug will become very apparent.
PR was not targeted to any particular release. Changing target milestone to 2.1
Was fixed in HEAD and CDT_2_0 branch.
